description.narrative: FMO will invest USD 8 mln in 10 year notes that will catalyze shorter-tenor notes. The target market of the fund fits well with the MASSIF investment strategy to serve Tier II and III MFIs. Although the Latin America and Caribbean region has a relatively developed microfinance market with quite some competition and liquidity, most capital flows to Tier I MFIs. In addition to a financial return, the fund also delivers a significant social return.

participating-org.narrative: Global Partnerships Social Investment Fund 5.0 LLC
Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI
